narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this 1st pre-license inspection for a class "B" license.
Reviewed modules on: Maintaining Your License, Commercial Dog Breeders Housing part 2, Commercial Breeders
Program of Veterinary Care,  Commercial Dog Breeders Exercise, Commercial Dog Breeders Husbandry
Standards,  Commercial Dog Breeders Identification, Commercial Dog Breeders Transportation, GPHR
Identification, GPHR Husbandry and GPHR Transportation with applicant.
Applicant will mail this signed copy of the report and license fee of $60.00 into the Western Regional Office.
The address is:
USDA, APHIS/ Animal Care                                                                                                                                      
2150 Centre Ave
Bldg. B, M.S. 3W11
Ft. Collins, Co, 80526-8117
NO COVERED ACTIVITY CAN OCCUR UNTIL LICENSE IS RECEIVED. 
This pre-license inspection and exit interview conducted with facility representative.
